name: awx-mcp-server
description: Control AWX/Ansible Tower through the Model Context Protocol. Manage infrastructure automation with natural language.
long_description: AWX MCP Server enables AI agents and assistants to interact with AWX/Ansible Tower instances through the Model Context Protocol. Execute playbooks, manage inventories, monitor jobs, and automate infrastructure tasks using natural language with GitHub Copilot, Claude, Cursor, or any MCP-compatible client.

awx_base_url.title: AWX Base URL
awx_base_url.description: The base URL of your AWX/Ansible Tower instance (e.g., https://awx.example.com)

awx_token.title: AWX API Token
awx_token.description: Your AWX API token for authentication. Generate this in AWX under User Settings > Tokens.

awx_username.title: AWX Username
awx_username.description: Username for password-based authentication (alternative to token)

awx_password.title: AWX Password
awx_password.description: Password for password-based authentication (alternative to token)

awx_verify_ssl.title: Verify SSL Certificates
awx_verify_ssl.description: Whether to verify SSL certificates when connecting to AWX. Set to false for self-signed certificates.
